duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on projects related to fund accounting, valuations, portfolio monitoring, performance reporting, and closing the books for clients.
Utilize accounting and reporting skills to extract, review, summarize, and report actionable information from data.
Collaborate with auditors and assist in the audit process.
Demonstrate proficiency in Excel and at least one accounting software, with experience in Investran or similar alternative investment software as a plus.
Possess strong organizational, written, and oral communication skills.
Maintain a positive, client service orientation and a strong work ethic.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Accounting (MBA or CPA preferred)
